mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hot_place(member_id, content_id, content_type_id, title, `desc`, visited_date, upload_file_name, store_file_name) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{contentId}, #{contentTypeId}, #{title}, #{desc}, #{visitedDate}, #{uploadFileName}, #{storeFileName})
mapper.update: UPDATE hot_place SET title = #{title}, `desc` = #{desc}, visited_date = #{visitedDate}, upload_file_name = #{uploadFileName}, store_file_name = #{storeFileName}, mod_date = current_timestamp WHERE hot_place_id = #{hotplaceId}
